summary.span: 取得接收的位元組數目。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷發生何種傳輸的百分比，請使用屬性。To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的處理常式實作事件。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for the event. 此方法會顯示這個屬性的值。The method displays the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TotalBytesToReceive As Long
public: property long TotalBytesToReceive { long get(); };

summary.span: 取得 資料下載作業中的位元組總數。

span.span: Gets the total number of bytes in a data download operation.

value.span: 值，表示將會收到的位元組數。

span.span: An value that indicates the number of bytes that will be received.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷已接收的位元組數目，請使用屬性。To determine the number of bytes already received, use the property. 若要判斷發生何種傳輸的百分比，請使用屬性。To determine what percentage of the transfer has occurred, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的處理常式實作事件。The following code example shows an implementation of a handler for the event. 此方法會顯示這個屬性的值。The method displays the value of this property.
